alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jefferson County through 630 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Birmingham, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Irondale, Leeds, Fairfield, Fultondale, Tarrant, Ketona Lakes, Birmingham Fairgounds, B.j.c.c., Edgewater, Kingston, Five Points South, Barber Motorsports Park, Ensley, Birmingham Airport and Legion Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
